title: "Assignment 03 -- Creating a data analysis report"
---

This is a **group** assignment.  Continue with the research question you had chosen in class. 

Use AI iteratively to *help* you create a report. 

### Tasks

  * Think in terms of two variables ($x$ and $y$). 
    * Pick a single variable or a combined index of variables
    * Pick a GDP variable
    * Think about a causal link. 
  * Create one carefully designed graph to illustrate the relationship (Graph 1)
  * At each step, explain your choices/decisions (ie why you chose a certain variable)
  * Create a Conclusion paragraph where you summarize your work and results in 80-100 words.
* create another graph to show heterogeneity of country size groups using population (Graph 2)
* Run a regression and interpret the coefficient. Make sure they are precise.

### AI use restrictions

* For the report, use AI as your assistant, use it as *input* not as *output*. Don't submit an AI-generated report as such, always author, review, edit. 
* Do not use AI to help you generate the advice. We want to hear your personal examples and reflections, not AI-generated suggestions.
